charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was on [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ]
way to go train...when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was suddenly
ambushed by two masked men!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_0300_:
Hand over your Pokémon and walk away quietly...
unless you want this to get ugly!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0401_0500_: Hah! I ain’t askin’ permission, kid!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0302_0600_: Looking for a battle? You found one!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0402_0700_: Hah! The kid wants to fight back!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_0800_:
Sounds like we gotta teach you what happens
when you talk back to us!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_1000_: Two against one hardly seems fair.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_1100_: I think I’ll...slither on into this battle.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_1200_:
Two against two?! Then I’m out! Fair battles ain’t
my style!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_1300_: Fine! You’re off the hook...this time!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_1400_:
Luck must not be on your side if you’re getting
tangled up with the likes of...them.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0301_1500_: Lucky me that you showed up, then!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0401_1600_:
Please. Knowing you...I’m sure you could have
handled them without my help.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0302_1700_:
Facing them alone would’ve
been unluckier.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0402_1800_:
Please. Knowing you...I’m sure you could have
handled them without my help.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_1900_: But I suppose that’s neither here nor there...
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_2000_:
I was just on my way to the woods to do some
training. How about it?
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_2500_:
I’m actually glad you’re here. I was thinking of
practicing for team battles.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_2600_:
Battles on Pasio are decided by how well you
cooperate with other sync pairs, after all.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_2700_:
I’ll have to pull out all the stops...but victory will
be mine!
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_2800_: No matter who I have to battle to get it.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0301_2900_: Do you have someone in mind?
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0401_3000_:
Yes. Someone who...defeated me at the Battle
Frontier a long time ago.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0302_3100_: Someone you know might be here?
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0402_3200_:
Yes. Someone who...defeated me at the Battle
Frontier a long time ago.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_3300_:
At one point during our battle...we stood there
locked in place, unable to move.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_3400_:
Almost like a Zangoose and a Seviper staring each
other down...
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_3500_:
We both knew that the first one to show even
a glimpse of an opening would lose.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_3600_:
We are fated to be rivals, it seems. And I
absolutely refuse to lose.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_3700_:
The next time we battle, I’ll put my constricting
and poisoning moves to work and whittle away
their strength...nice and slowly.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_3800_:
If, by some chance, we managed to defeat that
Trainer together...
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_3900_:
I wouldn’t forget the battles you and I had fought
together...ever.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_4000_: But not in a regretful way... In a pleasant way.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0401_4200_: I’m afraid I’ve said too much... How unlike me.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_0402_4400_:
You think so? Well, should that day come, I look
forward to it.
charaepi_ch0198_00_azami/2301_1201_4500_: Now then...time to finally start training.
